add_collateral(uint256).details: all functions below: if _collateralAmount is 0 will just return

borrow_more(uint256,uint256).details: all functions below: if _debtAmount is 0 will just return

params._useEth: relevant only for ETH collateral pools (currently not deployed)

repay(uint256).details: if _debtAmount > debt will do full repay

params._maxActiveBand: Don't allow active band to be higher than this (to prevent front-running the repay)
